heading: HR00130
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE COMMITTEE ON WELFARE OF CHILDREN TO CONDUCT, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, THE ONLINE REPORT BY AGENCE FRANCE PRESSE (AFP) ON JULY 22, 2019, ENTITLED “WORSE THAN PRISON”: ABUSES IN PHILIPPINE YOUTH HOMES,' DELINEATING THE ABJECT CONDITION OF YOUTH DETAINED IN YOUTH DETENTION CENTERS, AND PRESCRIBE COUNTERMEASURES IN ORDER TO CURTAIL THE SAME

House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00130
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE COMMITTEE ON WELFARE OF CHILDREN TO CONDUCT, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, THE ONLINE REPORT BY AGENCE FRANCE PRESSE (AFP) ON JULY 22, 2019, ENTITLED “WORSE THAN PRISON”: ABUSES IN PHILIPPINE YOUTH HOMES,' DELINEATING THE ABJECT CONDITION OF YOUTH DETAINED IN YOUTH DETENTION CENTERS, AND PRESCRIBE COUNTERMEASURES IN ORDER TO CURTAIL THE SAME
